questions.question: What do you need most right now?

yoga.title: Your path is Yoga
yoga.description: Your body asks for conscious movement and connection. We recommend joining our Vinyasa Flow or Hatha Yoga classes to channel that energy.

therapy.title: You need Healing and Rest
therapy.description: It's time to stop and take care of yourself. Our holistic therapies or a relaxing massage are just what you need to restore your balance.

space.title: Our Space
space.subtitle: A haven of peace in the city
space.description_1: At Arunachala, we have created an environment specifically designed for calm and introspection. Our center is conceived not only as a place to practice yoga, but as a sanctuary to disconnect from outside noise and reconnect with yourself.
space.description_2: We have a diaphanous main room, bathed in natural light and equipped with high quality organic materials. The atmosphere, impregnated with soft aromas and silence, invites deep and meditative practice from the first moment you cross the door.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Susana Pérez Gil
about.mission: Accompanying your path towards integral well-being
about.intro: My name is Susana Pérez Gil. My mission for more than 25 years has been to accompany people on their path towards integral well-being, consciously integrating body, mind, and the emotional dimension.
about.path_title: My Path: 25 years of learning and evolution
about.path_p1: What began as a personal search for physical health and mental stability more than two decades ago was transformed into a deep journey of self-knowledge. My connection with India and its rich spiritual culture was the engine that impelled me to explore Yoga not only as exercise, but as a true leap in consciousness.
about.specialties_title: Training and Specialties: The art of listening to the body
about.specialties_intro: To offer you complete care, I have specialized in various disciplines that combine the physical with the energetic:
about.cat_manual_desc: Expert in Chiromassage, Lymphatic Drainage, Reflexology, and Acupressure.
about.cat_subtle_desc: Practitioner of Metamorphic Technique and Reiki, key tools for emotional balance.
about.cat_yoga_desc: Certified Yoga Teacher, with specific training to adapt the practice to different life stages.
about.approach: My approach unites the benefits of massage with the depth of Yoga, using Sanskrit and mantras as a sacred bridge between breath and consciousness.
about.arunachala_p1: The name of this space was born after a transformative experience on the Holy Mountain of Aruṇāchala (Tiruvannamalai, India). That ascent marked a before and after, giving identity to my dream: to create a refuge based on respect, active listening, and absolute presence.
about.quote: "A place where every practice and every session is an invitation to return to oneself."
about.cta_p1: At Yoga and Therapies Aruṇāchala, I offer you a well-being path designed to your measure. If you are looking for a space for conscious care where you can rediscover yourself, this is your place.

seo.title: Susana Pérez Gil | About Us | Arunachala Yoga
seo.description: Meet Susana Pérez Gil, founder of Arunachala. Over 25 years of experience in Yoga, massage, and holistic therapies in Cornellà.

seo.title: Legal Notice | Arunachala Yoga & Therapies
seo.description: Legal notice and terms of use of the Arunachala Yoga & Therapies website in Cornellà de Llobregat.

identification.title: Identification
identification.company_value: Susana Pérez Gil - Arunachala Yoga & Therapies
identification.address_value: Passatge de Mateu Oliva 3, ground floor, 08940 Cornellà de Llobregat, Barcelona

object.title: Purpose of the Website
object.content: This website offers information about Arunachala's yoga classes, holistic therapies and massages. By using this website, you accept the terms of use established here.

conditions.title: Terms of Use
conditions.content: The user agrees to use the website appropriately and in accordance with the law, without disseminating inappropriate content or performing actions that may damage the operation of the website.

property.title: Intellectual Property
property.content: All contents of this website (texts, images, logos, design) are property of Arunachala. You may view them for personal use, but you may not reproduce, distribute or modify them without authorization.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Arunachala strives to keep the information up-to-date and correct, but is not responsible for possible errors or omissions in the contents, nor for temporary service interruptions.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.content: This legal notice is governed by Spanish legislation. Any dispute will be resolved in the courts of Barcelona.
